bioconda.name: dig2
bioconda.summary: dig2 is a simple but flexible in silico digester of protein sequences in the FASTA format. It allows for almost any enzyme to be simulated, including MS/MS enzymes to generate CID or ECD/ETD fragments.

biocontainers.name: dig2
biocontainers.summary: dig2 is a simple but flexible in silico digester of protein sequences in the FASTA format. It allows for almost any enzyme to be simulated, including MS/MS enzymes to generate CID or ECD/ETD fragments.
